messages.message: Let me take another stab at the PR. Since itâ€™s a larger change, we want the tests to pass but it was being tested during the 2 weeks where Cypress was unreliable.
Got it, by "larger change" do you just mean in terms of how it affects existing cypress tests? Cause in terms of code we are just changing the endpoint and format of the request body right?
Yeah, how it affects Cypress tests. If the change breaks Cypress tests, it effectively blocks all frontend engineers from merging their PRs until the tests are fixed.
So might as well fix it within this PR itself.
